EmailTemplate.name: New Job Opportunity Template for LinkedIn/Email
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re hiring and we’re excited about your experience!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Contact_First_Name__c},
We have started hiring for a newly opened position, Independent Palmetto Alchemist--and we think you might be interested! We'd love the opportunity to chat with you in further detail.
We look forward to your application!
Sincerely,
Bryan Hoffman Palmetto Alchemist Account Manager (843) 996-4596
